name: Flight Planning Manager
description:
The role comprises of the following elements:

Planning

Daily & hourly flight planning

Route & flight planning

Dispatch functions, including planning and management of:

  • Planning flights from a till z
  • Crew briefs and communication
  • Working with official flight planning tools
  • Ground handling requirements
  • Overflight permissions and any necessary work permissions
  • Landing permits
  • Fuel requirements and fuel releases
  • Coordination with the engineering team

An aviation background would be great, but not a must.

Knowledge of English and Spanish or French is essential. Portugese would be an advantage.

The successful candidates will receive a proper training on site to use and understand the tools and to be able to comply with the Operation Control Center manual and safety procedures.
